title: U.S. teens : most frequently accessed social networks 2019
yAxis: Share of respondents who use network most often
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents who use network most often for 9 number of Platforms.
The maximum Share of respondents who use network most often 25.0 is found at Platform Instagram and the minimum is found at Other where Platform is 1.0.
The lowest value at Platform Other is 25.0x times less than the highest value at Instagram.
min_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of respondents who use network most often in each Platform on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents who use network most often 25.0 is found at Platform Instagram and the minimum is found at Other where Platform is 1.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents who use network most often for 9 number of Platforms.
The maximum Share of respondents who use network most often 25.0 is found at Platform Instagram and the minimum is found at Other where Platform is 1.0.
The lowest value at Platform Other is 25.0x times less than the highest value at Instagram.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Share of respondents who use network most often in the y axis.
The Share of respondents who use network most often is highest at Platform Instagram and lowest at Platform Other.
Platform Facebook has the second highest value for Share of respondents who use network most often.
The highest Platform Instagram has 24.0 more Share of respondents who use network most often than the lowest Platform Other.
The Platform Instagram has the highest Share of respondents who use network most often, followed by Facebook, and Snapchat. Down to the Platform Other which is the lowest.
Platform Other, and Don't know have the same Share of respondents who use network most often.
The highest value 25.0 at Instagram is almost 2.25 times larger than the average value 11.11.
The Share of respondents who use network most often is 100.0 if we add up values of all Platforms.
